author: Jason E. Clapham
description: Brilliantly balanced and composed, this is a rum-forward boozy digestive with herbal complexity and enlivening ginger to contemplate a great meal and a good yarn relayed by a fellow diner.
name: Hunter's Verdict
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
